definition: of only average quality; not very good

definition: satisfactory or acceptable in quality or quantity

definition: severe or bare in appearance or outline

description: Used to make something easier to understand by comparing it to something familiar

description: Often heard in the summer, especially in warm climates

definition: a passage between rows of seats or shelves
description: Common in stores, airplanes, and theaters

description: Typically used to describe memory loss or confusion in the elderly
Usually affectionate or humorous in tone

word: take something with a grain of salt

description: Suggests not taking something too literally or seriously

description: Can also describe something morally repugnant
